sb3.tips.1: The Loot Bee is your friend. Don't kill him, but collect the loot before it despawns!
sb3.tips.2: Ultiminer requires a tool in your hand and can't be used on Stone.
sb3.tips.3: Cardboard boxes can be used to pick up spawners!
sb3.tips.4: Most crops require a light level of 8 or higher to grow; some require even higher.
sb3.tips.5: Hold your 'W' key when hovering over a Create item to open Ponder, it'll show you a lot of information about it.
sb3.tips.6: Most of your questions might be answered somewhere in the quest book!
sb3.tips.7: Press Y to find items in nearby chests.
sb3.tips.8: Chance Cubes. are evil. Open them FAR away from your base, if you dare...
sb3.tips.9: Passive mobs require grass, high light levels, no existing nearby passive mobs, and the player must be 24 blocks away.
sb3.tips.10: Using a crook on any type of dirt, sand and leaves will give you items.
sb3.tips.11: Bonemeal grass blocks and break the grass for hemp seeds.
sb3.welcome.title: Welcome
sb3.welcome.welcome.title: Welcome to &5FTB StoneBlock 3&r!
sb3.welcome.welcome.subtitle: Introduction and information
sb3.welcome.welcome.description_1: This modpack is placed &bentirely within an underground world&r, with no surface.
sb3.welcome.welcome.description_2: As you &6travel further from your spawn point&r, you will come across dungeons, caves, and eventually a ring of Nether and End.
sb3.welcome.welcome.description_3: Every player has their own dimension, spawning at &60,0&r, and has their own rings.
sb3.welcome.welcome.description_4: You can teleport to another player using the &6/tpa&r command.
sb3.welcome.servers.title: Starting
sb3.welcome.servers.subtitle: How to actually start
sb3.welcome.servers.desc1: The world/server spawn is in a lobby area. Everyone spawns here, but you shouldn't &ostay&r here.
sb3.welcome.servers.desc2: To &6create your dimension&r, go through the portal in the center. You can choose your dimension's starting cave there. This also creates an &eFTB Teams&r party.
sb3.welcome.servers.desc3: Joining another player's party will send you to their dimension!
sb3.welcome.servers.desc4: Once you're in a party, you can use the command &6/ftbstoneblock home&r to teleport to your dimension's origin.
sb3.welcome.servers.desc5: You can use the command &6/ftbstoneblock lobby&r to teleport to the lobby.
sb3.welcome.events.title: Events
sb3.welcome.events.subtitle: Sometimes, things just happen
sb3.welcome.events.desc1: On your journey through StoneBlock 3, you will occasionally find random &6special events&r happening to you.
sb3.welcome.events.desc2: We don't want to spoil them right away, but they can reach from giving you &ehandy loot&r to just being &efunny&r or &emildly annoying&r jokes (depending on who you ask).
sb3.welcome.events.desc3: If you want to toggle off individual events, or see a list of all of them, you can use the &6/events toggle &e<eventname>&r command.
sb3.getting_started.title: Getting Started!
sb3.getting_started.stonepebbles.title: Rock and Stone!
sb3.getting_started.stonepebbles.subtitl: Break some Stone with your bare hands
sb3.getting_started.stonepebbles.descrip: Alone in a cave with nothing but rocks, what's a better use of your time than punching them?
Mining Stone with your fists results in dropping &bStone Pebbles&r, which can be &6crafted into Cobblestone&r.
Can be eaten if, for whatever reason, you would want to.
sb3.getting_started.craftingtable.title: Crafting Table
sb3.getting_started.craftingtable.descri: Without wood, make do with Stone!
Four Cobblestone can be crafting into a &bCrafting Table&r.
sb3.getting_started.hammer.title: Hammer Down!
sb3.getting_started.hammer.subtitle: Make a Stone Hammer
sb3.getting_started.hammer.description_1: The &bStone Hammer&r crushes mined blocks, dropping a more granular block.
sb3.getting_started.hammer.description_2: You can see its drops in &eREI&r by checking its uses in recipes.
sb3.getting_started.chest.title: Chest
sb3.getting_started.chest.subtitle: Make a Stone Chest
sb3.getting_started.chest.description_1: The mod &eStone Chest&r adds &bStone Chests&r. Absolutely fascinating.
sb3.getting_started.chest.description_2: All Stone Chests work identically to normal Chests.
sb3.getting_started.saplings.title: Saplings
sb3.getting_started.saplings.subtitle: Get a Sapling
sb3.getting_started.saplings.description: You can get &bSaplings&r from &6mining Dirt with a Crook&r.
sb3.getting_started.wood.title: Wood!
sb3.getting_started.wood.subtitle: Grow and chop a tree
sb3.getting_started.wood.description_1: Make sure you have enough room for a tree to grow!
sb3.getting_started.wood.description_2: You can make the Sapling grow faster by &6running, jumping, and sneaking&r near it!
sb3.getting_started.ticon.title: Tinkers' Tools
sb3.getting_started.ticon.subtitle: Make the basic Tinker tables
sb3.getting_started.ticon.desc: The &bTinker Station&r can make basic modular tools, using parts made in the &bPart Builder&r.
sb3.getting_started.melter.title: Melter
sb3.getting_started.melter.subtitle: Make the Melter
sb3.getting_started.melter.desc1: The &bMelter&r is a multiblock that allows you to &6melt metals into fluids&r.
sb3.getting_started.melter.desc2: Place the &bSeared Heater&r, provide it with solid fuel, then place the &bSeared Melter&r on top.
sb3.getting_started.casting.title: Casting
sb3.getting_started.casting.subtitle: Cast something
sb3.getting_started.casting.desc1: To convert molten metals back into items, you need to use the &bCasting Faucet&r and a &bCasting Table/Basin&r.
sb3.getting_started.casting.desc2: To choose the form the metal will take (Ingot, Pickaxe Head, etc), you need to use a &bCast&r. Sand Casts are &cdestroyed on use&r, while Gold Casts are reusable.
sb3.getting_started.casting.desc3: To make a Sand Cast, place a Blank Sand Cast on a Casting Table, then click it with the Part you want to make a Cast of.
sb3.getting_started.casting.desc4: The Faucet can be activated with a click or with a Redstone Signal. It basically acts as a pipe, moving fluid from the block behind it to the block below. It can be replaced with an actual pipe if you prefer.
sb3.getting_started.smeltery.title: Smeltery
sb3.getting_started.smeltery.subtitle: Make a Smeltery
sb3.getting_started.smeltery.desc1: The &bSmeltery&r is a multiblock that &6melts metals&r and &6combines molten metals into alloys&r.
sb3.getting_started.smeltery.desc2: Its shape is much more freeform than the Melter. See &6Mighty Smelting&r for a guide on how to build it.
sb3.getting_started.smeltery.desc3: &6Some molten metals mix, creating alloys&r. This only happens if you have fuel, so a massive Smeltery with no fuel will function as a safe tank for storing molten metals.
sb3.getting_started.smeltery.desc4: The more Seared blocks that make up the Smeltery, the more fuel is used up, and the more items and fluids it can store.
sb3.getting_started.smeltery.desc8: Ores (and Raw Ores) melted in the Smeltery yield more than they would in a Furnace.
sb3.getting_started.crook.title: Wololo
sb3.getting_started.crook.subtitle: Make a Crook
sb3.getting_started.crook.description_1: Mining certain blocks with a &bCrook&r will make them drop items like &6Saplings and Seeds&r.
sb3.getting_started.crook.description_2: You can see its drops in &eREI&r by checking its uses in recipes.
sb3.getting_started.seeds.title: SEEDS?
sb3.getting_started.seeds.subtitle: Get seeds
sb3.getting_started.seeds.description_1: Using a &6Crook&r on Dirt has a chance of dropping &bany of these Seed items&r.
sb3.getting_started.seeds.description_2: You can see the chance for each in &eREI&r.
sb3.getting_started.gravel.title: Gravel
sb3.getting_started.gravel.subtitle: Get Gravel
sb3.getting_started.dirt.title: Dirt
sb3.getting_started.dirt.subtitle: Get Dirt
sb3.getting_started.sand.title: Sand
sb3.getting_started.sand.subtitle: Get Sand
sb3.getting_started.dust.title: Dust
sb3.getting_started.dust.subtitle: Get Dust
sb3.getting_started.millstone.title: Sieves? Never heard of 'em
sb3.getting_started.millstone.subtitle: Make a Millstone setup
sb3.getting_started.millstone.descriptio: You can get basic resources like Iron using the &bMillstone&r. More advanced resources aren't available until later.
Like everything in &eCreate&r, the Millstone is powered with rotational force.
Likewise, you can hold &6[w]&r while hovering over any Create item to see a short animation explaining how it works, including how it's powered.
sb3.getting_started.millgravel.title: Resources
sb3.getting_started.millgravel.subtitle: Mill some Gravel
sb3.getting_started.millgravel.descripti: &6Milling Gravel&r has a chance of producing &bIron&r, &bZinc&r, and &bCoal&r.
sb3.getting_started.lava.title: Lava
sb3.getting_started.lava.subtitle: Collect Lava
sb3.getting_started.lava.description_1: You can make &bLava&r by using the &bFire Plow&r on Stone for some time.
sb3.getting_started.water.title: Water
sb3.getting_started.water.subtitle: Collect Water
sb3.getting_started.water.description_1: You can get &bWater&r by right-clicking a &bCauldron&r with Leaves or Saplings.
sb3.getting_started.dripper.title: Ultra Dripstinct
sb3.getting_started.dripper.subtitle: Make a Dripper
sb3.getting_started.dripper.desc1: The &bDripper&r drips fluid onto the block below in order to turn it into other blocks.
sb3.getting_started.dripper.desc2: &6See REI for what blocks it can convert.
sb3.getting_started.cobble_gen1.subtitle: Make a Cobble Gen Tier1
sb3.getting_started.cobble_gen1.desc: The &bCobble Gen Tier1&r makes 1 Cobblestone every 2 seconds.
sb3.getting_started.cobble_gen1.desc2: Cobble is automatically pushed to an inventory above.
sb3.getting_started.cobble_gen2.subtitle: Make a Cobble Gen Tier2
sb3.getting_started.cobble_gen2.desc: The &bCobble Gen Tier2&r makes 1 Cobblestone every 1 second.
sb3.getting_started.cobble_gen3.subtitle: Make a Cobble Gen Tier3
sb3.getting_started.cobble_gen3.desc: The &bCobble Gen Tier3&r makes 1 Cobblestone every 0.5 seconds.
sb3.getting_started.cobble_gen4.subtitle: Make a Cobble Gen Tier4
sb3.getting_started.cobble_gen4.desc: The &bCobble Gen Tier4&r makes 1 Cobblestone every 0.25 seconds.
sb3.getting_started.cobble_gen5.subtitle: Make a Cobble Gen Tier5
sb3.getting_started.cobble_gen5.desc: The &bCobble Gen Tier5&r makes 1 Cobblestone every 0.05 seconds.
sb3.getting_started.soulsand.subtitle: Get Soul Sand
sb3.getting_started.soulsand.desc1: You can get &bSoul Sand&r by combining Sand, a Mob Soul, and some Water in a &6Mixer&r.
sb3.getting_started.soulsand.decs2: After your first, you can make more by &6Bulk Haunting&r with a Fan.
sb3.getting_started.mobsoul.subtitle: Get a Mob Soul
sb3.getting_started.mobsoul.desc: &bMob Souls&r have an 20%% chance of dropping any time a mob dies.
sb3.getting_started.encased_fan.title: Wosh u hand
sb3.getting_started.encased_fan.subtitle: Make an Encased Fan
sb3.getting_started.encased_fan.desc1: The &bEncased Fan&r uses rotational force to create an air current.
sb3.getting_started.encased_fan.desc2: If the air current passes through certain blocks (like Water and Lava), the air current can be used as a crafting mechanic.
sb3.getting_started.encased_fan.desc3: In particular, Water will &6wash items&r, creating others. Lava will &6blast items&r, cooking them as if in a Blast Furnace.
sb3.getting_started.washing.title: Washing
sb3.getting_started.washing.subtitle: Wash some resources
sb3.getting_started.washing.description_: You can get many resources from &bwashing Gravel, Sand, Dust, and Soulsand&r.
sb3.getting_started.nosolic.subtitle: Make a 'No Solicitors!' Sign
sb3.getting_started.nosolic.desc: The &b'No Solicitors!' Sign&r prevents Wandering Traders from spawning nearby.
sb3.getting_started.crushing_wheel.desc1: When two &bCrushing Wheels&r rotate into each other, they &6crush what passes through&r.
sb3.getting_started.crushing_wheel.desc2: While this can be used to process ores and the like, it is also how several are gathered.
sb3.getting_started.crushing.title: Crushing
sb3.getting_started.crushing.subtitle: Crush some Gravel
sb3.getting_started.crushing.desc: &bCrushing Gravel&r will result in all of these drops.
sb3.getting_started.andesite.subtitle: Get Andesite
sb3.getting_started.andesite.desc1: If you mine either up or down far enough, you'll reach a layer of &bAndesite&r. Beyond that is &6Deepslate&r, and only then is there Bedrock.
sb3.getting_started.andesite.desc2: Click here to see more information
sb3.exploration.title: Exploration
sb3.exploration.layers.title: Stone Layers
sb3.exploration.layers.subtitle: Explore the stone layers
sb3.exploration.layers.desc1: The overworld portion of the map is separated into 5 slices, split by y-levels.
sb3.exploration.layers.desc2: The center slice is made of &bStone&r, &655 blocks tall&r above and below y0.
sb3.exploration.layers.desc3: Above and below that, there are &620 block tall&r slices of &bAndesite&r.
sb3.exploration.layers.desc4: Above and below &othat&r, there is a &653 block tall&r layer of &bDeepslate&r.
sb3.exploration.stone_dungeon.title: Stone Dungeon
sb3.exploration.stone_dungeon.subtitle: Visit a Stone Dungeon
sb3.exploration.stone_dungeon.desc: The &bStone Dungeon&r is a massive dungeon that can be found in the outer half of the Stone circle.
sb3.exploration.spawner_dungeon.title: Spawner Dungeon
sb3.exploration.spawner_dungeon.subtitle: Visit a Spawner Dungeon
sb3.exploration.spawner_dungeon.desc: The &bSpawner Dungeon&r is a much smaller dungeon, comprised of a single room.
sb3.exploration.nether.title: The Nether
sb3.exploration.nether.subtitle: Reach the Nether Ring
sb3.exploration.nether_dungeon.title: Nether Dungeons
sb3.exploration.nether_dungeon.subtitle: Visit a Nether Dungeon
sb3.exploration.nether_dungeon.desc: The &bNether Dungeon&r is a massive dungeon that can be found in the Nether ring.
sb3.exploration.end.title: The End
sb3.exploration.end.subtitle: Reach the End Ring
sb3.exploration.end.desc2: Continuing even further, the ring &6ends around 2,200 blocks from spawn&r. Past that is infinite Stone, with unique dungeons dotted around.
sb3.exploration.end_city.title: End Cities
sb3.exploration.end_city.subtitle: Visit an End City
sb3.exploration.end_city.desc: &bEnd Cities&r can be found in the End Ring
sb3.exploration.boss_dungeon.title: Boss Dungeon
sb3.exploration.boss_dungeon.subtitle: Visit a Boss Dungeon
sb3.exploration.boss_dungeon.desc1: &bBoss Dungeons&r can be found &6beyond the End Ring&r.
sb3.exploration.boss_dungeon.desc2: Inside can be found a &6Summoning Altar&r, which can be used to summon the modpack's boss.
sb3.exploration.mother_silverfish.subtit: Summon and kill the Mother Silverfish
sb3.exploration.mother_silverfish.desc1: The &bMother Silverfish&r is summoned in the Boss Dungeons found outside of the End Ring. Summon it in the Summoning Altar and defeat it!
sb3.exploration.mother_silverfish.desc2: Watch out, as the Mother Silverfish has several special attacks, and can summon &6several types of Silverfish minions&r.
sb3.exploration.mother_silverfish.desc3: The possible summons are the &6Leech&r, &6Poison&r, and &6Thief&r Silverfish. The last one is especially dangerous, so be careful!
sb3.exploration.silverfish_farm.title: Farm the Mother Silverfish
sb3.exploration.silverfish_farm.desc1: You can easily &6farm infinite Silverfish Hearts&r from the Mother Silverfish, by using several mods in tandem.
sb3.exploration.silverfish_farm.desc2: The &bDrygmy Charm&r uses Source to &6gather mob drops without killing them&r.
sb3.exploration.silverfish_farm.desc3: Source can easily be made using a &6Volcanic Sourcelink&r, powered by Coal from &6Chickens&r (or any other source).
sb3.exploration.silverfish_farm.desc4: To keep the Mother Silverfish still, you can place a &bStasis Chamber&r &6directly underneath the Summoning Altar&r.
sb3.exploration.silverfish_farm.desc5: The Coal from before could also power a generator, providing the FE. Make sure to make a Fence to &6keep the Drygmy out of the Stasis Chamber's working area&r!
sb3.exploration.train.title: A trip through the world!
sb3.exploration.train.subtitle: Choo choo
sb3.exploration.train.desc1: Ride a train through all 5 biomes in one go!
sb3.exploration.train.desc2:
The biomes:
• Plains
• Lush Caves
• Nether Wastes
• The End
• Forest
sb3.resources.title: Resources
sb3.resources.mob_farming.title: Mob Grinding Utils
sb3.resources.mob_farming.solidifier.tit: Would You Like a Jelly Baby?
sb3.resources.mob_farming.solidifier.des: Solidify experience into lil' squishy, edible babies!
sb3.resources.mob_farming.spawner.title: Mob Spawning
sb3.resources.mob_farming.spawner.descri: The &bEntity Spawner&r spawns entities. Simple enough.
Insert a Spawn Egg in the top slot. To get the Spawn Egg, feed a Chicken some &bGM Chicken Feed&r of the mob you want to spawn.
The Spawner is fueled by &6XP Jelly Babies&r, which are inserted in the lower slot.
The buttons on the right allow you to move where mobs are spawned. The slots at the bottom can hold &6Upgrades&r.
sb3.resources.mob_farming.masher.title: Monster Mash
sb3.resources.mob_farming.masher.desc1: Time to grind up all those mobs using the &bMob Masher&r.
sb3.resources.mob_farming.masher.desc2: Upgrades allow it to kill hardier mobs faster, and drop more loot!
sb3.resources.mob_farming.hopper.descrip: Your mob farm will eventually reach a point where it's making more drops than it can collect.
The &bAbsorption Hopper&r can &6pick up mobs and xp&r in an area.
sb3.resources.mob_farming.fan.title: Blown Away
sb3.resources.mob_farming.fan.subtitle: Make a Mob Fan
sb3.resources.mob_farming.fan.descriptio: &bMob Fans&r will &6push mobs&r away from them when given a redstone signal.
The area can be seen in the GUI, and increased with Upgrades.
sb3.resources.mob_farming.chicken_feed_1: Right-click the feed on a chicken, brace your soul though.
sb3.resources.mob_farming.golden_egg.des: Use the &bGolden Egg&r on dirt or grass to gain a plot of &6Delightful Dirt&r!
sb3.resources.mob_farming.chicken_feed_2: Feed to a chicken for a fun time.
sb3.resources.mob_farming.rotton_egg.des: Use the &bRotten Egg&r on dirt or grass to gain a plot of &6Dreadful Dirt&r.
sb3.resources.mob_farming.dirt_1.title: Pacifist
sb3.resources.mob_farming.dirt_1.descrip: &bDelightful Dirt&r spawns most passive mobs, from chickens to cows, to other friendly modded mobs.
sb3.resources.mob_farming.dirt_2.title: Containment Breach!
sb3.resources.mob_farming.dirt_2.descrip: &bDreadful Dirt&r spawns all that goes bump in the night.
sb3.resources.mob_farming.upgrades.title: Upgrades
sb3.resources.mob_farming.upgrades.desc: Certain &bUpgrades&r can be inserted into the Fan, Spawner, Mob Masher, Hopper, and XP Solidifier.
sb3.resources.mob_farming.xp.title: Experience Robbery
sb3.resources.mob_farming.xp.subtitle: Donate 100 levels
sb3.resources.mob_farming.xp.description: I'm all out of experience, give me 100 levels and I'll give you some loot.
With your mob farm surely you'll be able to spare some!
sb3.resources.passive.title: Passive Resources
sb3.passive.drill.subtitle: Make a Laser Drill setup
sb3.passive.drill.desc1: The &bOre Laser Base&r and &bFluid Laser Base&r use FE to generate ores and fluids.
sb3.passive.drill.desc2: They do not accept FE on their own, they must be powered by &bLaser Drills&r.
sb3.chickens.catcher.title: Chicken Chaser
sb3.chickens.catcher.subtitle: Make a Chicken Catcher
sb3.chickens.catcher.desc: The &bChicken Catcher&r can be used on Chicken mobs to turn them into items.
sb3.chickens.breeder.subtitle: Make a Breeder
sb3.chickens.breeder.desc: The &bBreeder&r allows you to automatically breed Chickens as items using Seeds.
sb3.chickens.roost.subtitle: Make a Roost
sb3.chickens.roost.desc: The &bRoost&r will simulate Chicken items as if they were mobs, slowly generating their drops.
sb3.chickens.craft.title: Craftable Chickens
sb3.chickens.craft.subtitle: Craft a Chicken
sb3.chickens.bred.title: Bred Chicken
sb3.chickens.bred.subtitle: Crossbreed a Chicken
sb3.chickens.bred.desc: These &bChickens&r have to be crossbred from other Chickens.
sb3.resources.budding_crystals.title: Budding Crystals
sb3.resources.budding_crystals.subtitle: Make a Budding Crystal
sb3.resources.budding_crystals.desc: &bBudding Crystals&r work like Budding Amethyst, but for other resources.
sb3.tech.title: Tech
sb3.tech.industrial_forgoing.title: Industrial Foregoing
sb3.if.fe.subtitle: Make a Fluid Extractor
sb3.if.fe.desc: When the &bFluid Extractor&r is aimed at Logs, it generates &6Latex&r.
sb3.if.lpu.subtitle: Make a Latex Processing Unit
sb3.if.lpu.desc: The &bLatex Processing Unit&r uses FE and Water to turn Latex into &6Tiny Dry Rubber&r.
sb3.if.mc.subtitle: Make a Mob Crusher
sb3.if.mc.desc1: The &bMob Crusher&r kills mobs, collecting their drops. XP is collected as Essence.
sb3.if.mc.desc2: You can set it to use Looting at the expense of not generating Essence.
sb3.if.msf.subtitle: Make a Mob Slaughter Factory
sb3.if.msf.desc1: The &bMob Slaughter Factory&r kills mobs, destroying their drops and xp, instead generating &6Liquid Meat&r and &6Pink Slime&r.
sb3.if.msf.desc2: Passive mobs generate more Pink Slime than hostile ones.
sb3.if.af.title: Animal Farm
sb3.if.af.subtitle: Make an animal farm setup
sb3.if.af.desc1: The &bAnimal Feeder&r will use the feed in its inventory to breed adults in its work area.
sb3.if.af.desc2: The &bAnimal Baby Separator&r will teleport baby animals in front of itself to behind itself. It can be set to move adults instead.
sb3.if.af.desc3: You can have one pen of breeding stock, move the babies to a pen for them to grow in, then use another ABS to move the newly-grown adults to a pen with a killing machine.
sb3.if.cf.title: Crop Farm
sb3.if.cf.subtitle: Make a crop farm setup
sb3.if.cf.desc1: The &bPlant Sower&r plants seeds in its work area. You can set a separate seed for 9 quadrants.
sb3.if.cf.desc2: The &bPlant Gatherer&r gathers crops and trees in its work area. &6Ether&r will allow it to replant seeds/saplings automatically.
sb3.if.myc.title: Mycelial Generators
sb3.if.myc.subtitle: Make any Mycelial Generator
sb3.if.myc.desc1: The &bMycelial Reactor&r generates a massive amount of FE &6when all other Mycelial Generators are working simultaneously&r.
sb3.if.myc.desc2: Each of the &bMycelial Generators&r produce FE using unique fuels, like TNT or Dragon Breath.
sb3.if.wb.subtitle: Make a Wither Builder
sb3.if.wb.desc1: The &bWither Builder&r builds and spawns the Wither above itself, with a block to spare.
sb3.if.wb.desc2: Best used in combination with the &eRFTools&r Shield, as it is Wither-proof and can kill the Wither.
sb3.if.ra.title: Range Addons
sb3.if.ra.subtitle: Make a Range Addon
sb3.if.ra.desc: Most machines only have a 1x1x1 working area. &bRange Addons&r increase this.
sb3.if.oa.title: Speed Addons
sb3.if.oa.subtitle: Make one of the other Addons
sb3.if.oa.desc: These other &bAddons&r increase machines' speeds in several different methods.
sb3.if.it.subtitle: Make an Item Transporter
sb3.if.it.desc: &bItem Transporters&r can be used to quickly move items between inventories one block away from each other.
sb3.if.ft.subtitle: Make an Fluid Transporter
sb3.if.ft.desc: &bFluid Transporters&r can be used to quickly move fluids between tanks one block away from each other.
sb3.if.wt.subtitle: Make a World Transporter
sb3.if.wt.desc: &bWorld Transporters&r can be used to quickly move items between an inventory and the world, in item entity form.
sb3.tech.rftools.title: RF Tools
sb3.rft.builder.subtitle: Make a Builder
sb3.rft.builder.desc: The &bBuilder&r places blocks from an inventory above in whatever area set by the &bSpace Card&r inside.
sb3.rft.cards.title: Shape Cards
sb3.rft.cards.subtitle: Make an advanced Shape Card
sb3.rft.cards.desc: These advanced &bShape Cards&r can be used to place/collect fluids, as well as dig blocks.
sb3.rft.shield.title: Forcefield Shields
sb3.rft.shield.subtitle: Make a Shield setup
sb3.rft.shield.desc1: &bShield Projectors&r create Shields where connected &bShield Templates&r were, when clicked with a Wrench. The picture below shows before and after using the Wrench.
sb3.rft.shield.desc2: Shields can be given rules for how to interact with entities, like damaging Withers while letting players and mobs pass through, etc.
sb3.rft.shield.desc3: The Shield blocks are also Wither-proof! Don't forget to disallow Skulls from flying through!
sb3.rft.spawner.subtitle: Make a Spawner
sb3.rft.spawner.desc1: The &bSpawner&r spawns a mob set by the &bSyringe&r inside, which is filled by attacking the mob in question.
sb3.rft.spawner.desc2: All mobs need 3 things: Dirt/Gravel/Sand, plants, and an item unique to the mob. These are provided from linked &bMatter Beamers&r.
sb3.tech.powah.title: Powah!
sb3.powah.thermo.title: Thermo Generators
sb3.powah.thermo.subtitle: Make a Thermo Generator
sb3.powah.thermo.desc: &bThermo Generators&r generate FE from being place on heat sources.
sb3.powah.magmator.title: Magmators
sb3.powah.magmator.subtitle: Make a Magmator
sb3.powah.reactor.title: Reactors
sb3.powah.reactor.subtitle: Make a Reactor
sb3.powah.reactor.desc: &bReactors&r generate FE using Uraninite. They must be placed as a 3x4x3.
sb3.powah.cell.title: Energy Cells
sb3.powah.cell.subtitle: Make an Energy Cell
sb3.powah.battery.title: Batteries
sb3.powah.battery.subtitle: Make a Battery
sb3.powah.battery.desc: &bBatteries&r store FE, and can charge items in your inventory.
sb3.powah.cable.title: Energy Cables
sb3.powah.cable.subtitle: Make an Energy Cable
sb3.powah.ender.title: Ender Cells
sb3.powah.ender.subtitle: Make an Ender Cell
sb3.powah.ender.desc1: &bEnder Cells&r store FE in a wireless network, shared by any amount of Ender Cells.
sb3.powah.ender.desc2: The amount can be increased with Energy Cells.
sb3.powah.energizing.subtitle: Make an Energizing setup
sb3.powah.energizing.desc: The &bEnergizing Orb&r wirelessly receives power from &bEnergizing Rods&r nearby to craft items.
sb3.powah.player.title: Player Transmitters
sb3.powah.player.subtitle: Make a Player Transmitter
sb3.powah.player.desc: The &bPlayer Transmitter&r wirelessly charges items in the player's inventory.
sb3.powah.gate.title: Ender Gates
sb3.powah.gate.subtitle: Make an Ender Gate
sb3.powah.gate.desc: &bEnder Gates&r provide access to Ender Cell networks.
sb3.tech.thermal.title: Thermal Series
sb3.thermal.mc.subtitle: Make a Magma Crucible
sb3.thermal.mc.desc: The &bMagma Crucible&r melts items into fluids.
sb3.thermal.bc.subtitle: Make a Blast Chiller
sb3.thermal.bc.desc: The &bBlast Chiller&r converts fluids into items.
sb3.thermal.rf.subtitle: Make a Redstone Furnace
sb3.thermal.pulv.subtitle: Make a Pulverizer
sb3.thermal.aug.title: Augments
sb3.thermal.aug.subtitle: Make any Augment
sb3.thermal.aug.desc: &bAugments&r are basically upgrades that change how tools and machines function.
sb3.thermal.dynamo.title: Dynamos
sb3.thermal.dynamo.subtitle: Make any Dynamo
sb3.thermal.ic.title: Integral Components
sb3.thermal.ic.subtitle: Make any Integral Components
sb3.thermal.ic.desc: &bIntegral Components&r increase the tier of the machine, improving the base attributes.
sb3.thermal.msp.subtitle: Make a Multiservo Press
sb3.thermal.rfc.subtitle: Make a Redstone Flux Cell
sb3.thermal.rfc.desc: &bRedstone Flux Cels&r store FE. Storage can be improved with Augments and enchantments.
sb3.thermal.is.subtitle: Make an Induction Smelter
sb3.thermal.is.desc: The &bInduction Smelter&r combines items into new ones.
sb3.thermal.pi.subtitle: Make a Phytogenic Insolator
sb3.thermal.pi.desc: The &bPhytogenic Insolator&r grows crops, flowers, and trees.
sb3.thermal.ie.subtitle: Make an Igneous Extruder
sb3.thermal.ie.desc: The &bIgneous Extruder&r can combine Water and Lava into various blocks, like Stone or Deepslate.
sb3.tech.immersive_eng.title: Immersive Engineering
sb3.ie.eh.subtitle: Make the Engineer's Hammer
sb3.ie.eh.desc: The &bEngineer's Hammer&r is required to construct the various multiblocks in the mod.
sb3.ie.ak.title: Alloy Kiln
sb3.ie.ak.subtitle: Make an Alloy Kiln
sb3.ie.ak.desc: The &bAlloy Kiln&r combines metals into alloys.
sb3.ie.co.title: Coke Oven
sb3.ie.co.subtitle: Make a Coke Oven
sb3.ie.co.desc: The &bCoke Oven&r turns Coal into Coal Coke and Creosote Oil.
sb3.ie.bo.title: Crude Blast Furnace
sb3.ie.bo.subtitle: Make a Crude Blast Furnace
sb3.ie.ibf.title: Improved Blast Furnace
sb3.ie.ibf.subtitle: Make an Improved Blast Funace
sb3.ie.ibf.desc: The &bImproved Blast Furnace&r can be sped up with &bBlast Furnace Preheaters&r.
sb3.ie.mp.title: Metal Press
sb3.ie.mp.subtitle: Make a Metal Press
sb3.ie.mp.desc: The &bMetal Press&r shapes metals into various items.
sb3.ie.c.title: Crusher
sb3.ie.c.subtitle: Make a Crusher
sb3.ie.c.desc: The &bCrusher&r crushes items and mobs that enter the top.
sb3.ie.gc.subtitle: Make a Garden Cloche
sb3.ie.gc.desc: The &bGarden Cloche&r quickly grows crops in itself.
sb3.tech.mekanism.title: Mekanism
sb3.mek.heat.title: Hot Stuff
sb3.mek.heat.subtitle: Make a Resistive Heater
sb3.mek.heat.desc1: &6Heat&r is a fairly disused mechanic in &eMekanism&r. Some machines generate heat, which can be transfered through &6Thermodynamic Conductor&r pipes, and then some machines use up heat to do things.
sb3.mek.heat.desc2: The main thing you would want heat for is the &6Thermal Evaporation Plant&r. Normally, you would use 4 Solar Generators but... that's not really an option here.
sb3.mek.heat.desc3: The TEP is powered by heat, which is provided either by the biome, or through &6Thermal Evaporation Valves&r. A &bResistive Heater&r can turn FE into heat, which can power the TEP to the point it can work.
sb3.mek.vapor.title: Water Vapor
sb3.mek.vapor.subtitle: Make a Rotary Condensator
sb3.mek.vapor.desc1: &6Polonium&r requires Nuclear Waste, which means you need to &6power a Fission Reactor&r.
sb3.mek.vapor.desc2: Fission Reactors run on &6Fissile Fuel&r, which has a lengthy, complex recipe.
sb3.mek.vapor.desc3: The first step would be to make &6Water Vapor&r in the &bRotary Condensator&r.
sb3.mek.oxygen.title: Oxygen
sb3.mek.oxygen.subtitle: Make an Electrolytic Separator
sb3.mek.oxygen.desc1: The &bElectrolytic Separator&r turns one chemical into two others. Here, that would be turning Water into Hydrogen and &6Oxygen&r.
sb3.mek.oxygen.desc2: The Hydrogen can be dumped, as it isn't required for Fissile Fuel.
sb3.mek.sdo.title: Sulfur Dioxide
sb3.mek.sdo.subtitle: Make a Chemical Oxidizer
sb3.mek.sdo.desc: The &bChemical Oxidizer&r turns solids into chemicals. Here, that would be Sulfur into &6Sulfur Dioxide&r.
sb3.mek.lst.title: Sulfur Trioxide
sb3.mek.lst.subtitle: Make a Chemical Infuser
sb3.mek.lst.desc: The &bChemical Infuser&r combines two chemicals to make another. Here, that would be Sulfur Dioxide with Oxygen to make &6Sulfur Trioxide&r.
sb3.mek.sa.title: Sulfuric Acid
sb3.mek.sa.subtitle: Make Sulfuric Acid
sb3.mek.sa.desc: &bSulfuric Acid&r can be made by combining Sulfur Trioxide with Water Vapor.
sb3.mek.hfa.title: Hydrofluoric Acid
sb3.mek.hfa.subtitle: Make a Chemical Dissolution Chamber
sb3.mek.hfa.desc: The &bChemical Dissolution Chamber&r uses Sulfuric Acid to dissolve items into a new chemical. Here, that would be Fluorite into &6Hydrofluoric Acid&r.
sb3.mek.yc.subtitle: Get Yellow Cake Uranium
sb3.mek.yc.desc: &bYellow Cake Uranium&r is a key ingredient in Fissile Fuel.
sb3.mek.uo.title: Uranium Oxide
sb3.mek.uo.subtitle: Get Uranium Oxide
sb3.mek.uo.desc: &bUranium Oxide&r can be created in the &6Chemical Oxidizer&r.
sb3.mek.uhf.title: Uranium Hexafluoride
sb3.mek.uhf.subtitle: Get Uranium Hexafluoride
sb3.mek.uhf.desc: &bUranium Hexafluoride&r is the main ingredient in Fissile Fuel.
sb3.mek.ff.title: Fissile Fuel
sb3.mek.ff.subtitle: Make an Isotopic Centrifuge
sb3.mek.ff.desc: The &bIsotopic Centrifuge&r turns one chemical into another. Here, that would be Uranium Hexafluoride into &6Fissile Fuel&r.
sb3.mek.fission.title: Fission Reactor
sb3.mek.fission.subtitle: Make a Fission Reactor
sb3.mek.fission.desc1: The &bFission Reactor&r is a large multiblock structure that generates a massive amount of heat, which can be used to make an extremely large amount of FE.
sb3.mek.fission.desc2: More importantly, however, it makes &6&oNuclear Waste&r.
sb3.mek.fission.desc3: Frankly, the Fission Reactor is much too complex to describe here. Luckily, there's a very good wiki page here:
sb3.mek.nw.title: Nuclear Waste
sb3.mek.nw.subtitle: Make a Pressurized Reaction Chamber
sb3.mek.nw.desc: The &bPressurized Reaction Chamber&r combines an item and a chemical into another item and another chemical.
sb3.mek.polonium.subtitle: Get Polonium
sb3.mek.polonium.desc1: &bPolonium&r is a radioactive material that's used in several recipes.
sb3.mek.polonium.desc2: None of those are important though. It's needed for the Singularity, and that's what really matters.
sb3.magic.title: Magic
sb3.magic.ars_nouveau.title: Ars Nouveau
sb3.ars.nsb.subtitle: Make a Novice Spell Book
sb3.ars.nsb.desc1: The &bNovice Spell Book&r allows you to make spells using Tier 1 Glyphs that you've learned.
sb3.ars.nsb.desc2: Make and learn new Glyphs at the &6Scribe's Table&r.
sb3.ars.st.subtitle: Make a Scribe's Table
sb3.ars.st.desc: You can make new &bGlyphs&r at the &bSCribe's Table&r by using a Spell Book on it, then throwing the requested items on top.
sb3.ars.msb.subtitle: Make a Mage's Spell Book
sb3.ars.msb.desc: The &bMage's Spell Book&r allows you to cast spells using Tier 2 Glpyhs that you've learned.
sb3.ars.asb.subtitle: Make the Archmage Spell Book
sb3.ars.asb.desc: The &bArchmage Spell Book&r allows you to cast spells using Tier 3 Glyphs that you've learned.
sb3.ars.ic.subtitle: Make an Imbuement Chamber
sb3.ars.ic.desc1: The &bImbuement Chamber&r uses Source to craft items.
sb3.ars.ic.desc2: While it works faster with Source Jars nearby, it &6slowly generates Source&r on its own.
sb3.ars.sl.title: Sourcelinks
sb3.ars.sl.subtitle: Make a Sourcelink
sb3.ars.sl.desc: &bSourcelinks&r generate Source in a variety of ways, depending on the Sourcelink. Source is sent to nearby &bSource Jars&r.
sb3.ars.sr.title: Source Relays
sb3.ars.sr.subtitle: make a Source Relay
sb3.ars.sr.desc: &bSource Relays&r transfer Source between Source Jars and other Relays.
sb3.ars.ea.subtitle: Make an Enchanting Apparatus
sb3.ars.ea.desc: The &bEnchanting Apparatus&r uses Source to combine items on nearby &bPedestals&r with an item in its own inventory, making something new.
sb3.ars.charms.title: Charms
sb3.ars.charms.subtitle: Make a Charm
sb3.ars.charms.desc: &bCharms&r spawn mobs that perform some sort of automation, depending on the mob.
sb3.ars.rb.subtitle: Make a Ritual Brazier
sb3.ars.rb.desc: The &bRitual Brazier&r uses Source to perform rituals, depending on the &bTablet&r given.
sb3.ars.fam.title: Familiars
sb3.ars.fam.subtitle: Get a Familiar
sb3.ars.fam.desc1: &bFamiliars&r provide passive or active buffs, depending on the Familiar.
sb3.ars.fam.desc2: Get the Scripts using the &bTablet of Binding&r near the appropriate mob.
sb3.ars.robe.title: Robes
sb3.ars.robe.subtitle: Make some magic armor
sb3.ars.robe.desc: &bRobes&r increase your mana capacity, each tier more than the last.
sb3.magic.botania.title: Botania
sb3.botania.ff.subtitle: Make Floral Fertilizer
sb3.botania.ff.desc: &bFloral Fertilizer&r grows Mystical Flowers when used.
sb3.botania.pa.subtitle: Make a Petal Apothecary
sb3.botania.pa.desc: The &bPetal Apothecary&r combines ingredients with Water to make magic Flowers.
sb3.botania.pd.subtitle: Make a Pure Daisy
sb3.botania.pd.desc: The &bPure Daisy&r converts Stone and Logs around it into Livingrock and Livingwood.
sb3.botania.mps.subtitle: Make a Mana Pool and Mana Spreader
sb3.botania.mps.desc: The &bMana Pool&r stores Mana, and the Mana Spreader moves it.
sb3.botania.ef.subtitle: Make an Endoflame
sb3.botania.ef.desc: The &bEndoflame&r generates Mana from dropped furnace fuels.
sb3.botania.ra.subtitle: Make a Runic Altar
sb3.botania.ra.desc: The &bRunic Altar&r uses to craft items.
sb3.botania.tap.subtitle: Make a Terrestrial Agglomeration Plate
sb3.botania.tap.desc: The &bTerrestrial Agglomeration Plate&r uses Mana from &bSparks&r (connected to nearby Mana Pools with Sparks) to craft Terrasteel.
sb3.botania.egc.subtitle: Make an Elven Gateway Core
sb3.botania.egc.desc: The &bElven Gateway Core&r is the heart of the &6Portal to Alfheim&r. Throw things in to get things back.
sb3.botania.e.subtitle: Get Elementium
sb3.botania.e.desc: &bElementium&r is made by tossing Manasteel through the Portal to Alfheim.
sb3.botania.st.subtitle: Make a Spark Tinkerer
sb3.botania.st.desc: The &bSpark Tinkerer&r allows you to install &bSpark Augments&r onto Sparks.
sb3.botania.gp.subtitle: Make a Gaia Pylon
sb3.botania.gp.desc: The &bGaia Pylon&r is required to spawn and fight the &6Guardian of Gaia&r.
sb3.botania.gog.subtitle: Kill the Guardian of Gaia
sb3.botania.gog.desc: The &bGuardian of Gaia&r is summoned through the Ritual of Gaia. Killing it will be difficult, but its drops are required for progression.
sb3.botania.ems.subtitle: Make an Elven Mana Spreader
sb3.botania.ems.desc: The &bElven Mana Sprader&r is an upgraded version of the Mana Spreader.
sb3.botania.gms.subtitle: Make a Gaia Mana Spreader
sb3.botania.gms.desc: The &bGaia Mana Spreader&r is an upgraded version of the Elven Mana Spreader.
sb3.botania.gs.subtitle: Get a Gaia Spirit
sb3.botania.gs.desc: &bGaia Spirits&r drop from the Guardian of Gaia.
sb3.botania.gsi.subtitle: Get a Gaia Spirit Ingot
sb3.botania.gsi.desc1: A &bGaia Spirit Ingot&r is required to summon and fight the second version of the Guardian of Gaia.
sb3.botania.gsi.desc2: This fight is much more difficult, but has even greater rewards.
sb3.botania.dof.subtitle: Get the Dice of Fate
sb3.botania.dof.desc: The &bDice of Fate&r (dropped by the second Guardian of Gaia) will give you a random Relic, which are unique and powerful items.
sb3.magic.blood_magic.title: Blood Magic
sb3.bm.ba.subtitle: Make a Blood Altar
sb3.bm.ba.desc1: The &bBlood Altar&r stores LP (blood, basically), and uses it to craft items.
sb3.bm.ba.desc2: For now, use a &bSacrificial Knife&r to fill it using your own health.
sb3.bm.wbo.subtitle: Make a Weak Blood Orb
sb3.bm.wbo.desc1: &bBlood Orbs&r give you a pool of LP, called a &6Soul Network&r, which is used to power Rituals and Sigils.
sb3.bm.wbo.desc2: The &bWeak Blood Orb&r is the first and smallest, holding &65,000 LP&r. Bind and fill it by right-clicking. You can also fill it in the Blood Altar.
sb3.bm.abo.subtitle: Make an Apprentice Blood Orb
sb3.bm.mbo.subtitle: Make a Magician Blood Orb
sb3.bm.mbo2.subtitle: Make a Master Blood Orb
sb3.bm.abo2.subtitle: Make an Archmage Blood Orb
sb3.bm.aa.subtitle: Make Arcane Ashes
sb3.bm.aa.desc: &bArcane Ashes&r are used for &6Alchemy Arrays&r, which craft items or perform other functions.
sb3.bm.sl.subtitle: Make a Slate
sb3.bm.sl.desc1: &bBlank Slates&r are some of the most basic ingredients in the mod. Just place Stone in a Blood Altar with at least 1,000 LP in it.
sb3.bm.sl.desc2: If you insert 2 Stone, it'll try to craft both at the same time, costing 2,000 LP. If you don't have 2,000 LP, the craft will fail, and the LP will be wasted.
sb3.bm.ss.subtitle: Make a Soul Snare
sb3.bm.ss.desc: If you throw &bSoul Snares&r at mobs, they have a chance of getting white particles. Killing them will drop &6Demon Will&r.
sb3.bm.dw.subtitle: Get Demon Will
sb3.bm.dw.desc: &bDemon Will&r drops from snared mobs. The Will Quality is random.
sb3.bm.tg.title: Tartaric Gems
sb3.bm.tg.subtitle: Make a Tartaric Gem
sb3.bm.tg.desc: &bTartaric Gems&r will absorb and store Demon Will as it is picked up.
sb3.bm.hf.subtitle: Make a Hellfire Forge
sb3.bm.hf.desc: The &bHellfire Forge&r uses Will (either from the Will item itself or a Tartaric Gem) to craft items.
sb3.bm.bat.title: Blood Altar Tiers
sb3.bm.bat.subtitle: Make a Tier 2 Blood Altar
sb3.bm.bat.desc1: The &6Blood Altar&r can be upgraded into 5 tiers, by placing certain blocks around it.
sb3.bm.bat.desc2: The second tier requires 8 &bRunes&r placed in a circle around it, one block below. Runes double as Altar upgrades, changing their functionality in some way.
sb3.bm.bat.desc3: Higher tiers are required for certain crafting recipes. See the &6Sanguine Scientem&r for a full guide of each.
sb3.bm.ds.subtitle: Make a Dagger of Sacrifice
sb3.bm.ds.desc: The &bDagger of Sacrifice&r allows you to use a mob's life energy instead of your own to make LP.
sb3.bm.at.subtitle: Make an Alchemy Table
sb3.bm.at.desc: The &bAlchemy Table&r uses LP from your Soul Network to craft items.
sb3.bm.br.subtitle: Make Binding Reagent
sb3.bm.br.desc: &bBinding Reagent&r is used to make &6Living Armor&r, an incredibly powerful set of armor that &6upgrades itself depending on how you use it&r.
sb3.bm.sig.title: Sigils
sb3.bm.sig.subtitle: Make any Sigil
sb3.bm.sig.desc: &bSigils&r use LP from your Soul Network to perform a variety of functions, like placing lights or growing crops.
sb3.bm.ritual.title: Rituals
sb3.bm.ritual.subtitle: Get the materials for Rituals
sb3.bm.ritual.desc1: &bRituals&r use LP from your Soul Network to perform various tasks. They vary from &6generating ores&r, &6growing crops&r, and &6damaging mobs for LP&r.
sb3.bm.ritual.desc2: They are centered on the &bMaster Ritual Stone&r, and a number of &bRitual Stones&r are placed nearby, colored with &bInscription Tools&r, and finally activated with an &bActivation Crystal&r.
sb3.bm.ritual.desc3: It is highly suggested to construct the ritual multiblock with a &6Ritual Diviner&r.
sb3.bm.rd.subtitle: Make a Ritual Diviner
sb3.bm.rd.desc: With the &bRitual Diviner&r, you can sneak-left- or right-click air to choose a Ritual, then use it on the Master Ritual Stone to place and color the Ritual Stones for that Ritual.
sb3.bm.edge.title: Edge of the Hidden Realm
sb3.bm.edge.subtitle: Visit a Dungeon
sb3.bm.edge.desc1: The &bEdge of the Hidden Realm&r Ritual will send you to a &6dungeon dimension&r made of 4 rooms, unlocked with &6Iron Keys&r.
sb3.bm.edge.desc2: Using the same Inversion Pillar will always send you to the same dungeon. You have to redo the Ritual to create a new one.
sb3.storage.title: Storage
sb3.storage.drawers.title: Functional Storage
sb3.storage.drawers.subtitle: Make a Drawer
sb3.storage.drawers.desc1: &eFunctional Storage&r is basically an analogue to &eStorage Drawers&r, with some changes.
sb3.storage.drawers.desc2: The basics remain the same. &bDrawers&r store a large amount of a single item. &bCompacting Drawers&r show items in their block, ingot, and nugget forms.
sb3.storage.storagecontroller.subtitle: Make a Storage Controller
sb3.storage.storagecontroller.desc1: The &bStorage Controller&r can connect Drawer inventories &6without touching them&r.
sb3.storage.storagecontroller.desc2: To connect the Controller to Drawers, use the &bLinking Tool&r.
sb3.storage.armory.subtitle: Make an Armory
sb3.storage.armory.desc1: The &bArmory&r can store &6up to 4096 unstackable items&r, in any combination.
sb3.storage.armory.desc2: You &ccannot open it&r, it has no GUI. You can only insert and extract using automation.
sb3.storage.fcups.title: Upgrades
sb3.storage.fcups.subtitle: Make any Drawer Upgrade
sb3.storage.fcups.desc2: They come in two types, and go in different slots. &6Storage&r Upgrades increase the Drawer's storage potential, and &6Utility&r Upgrades change how the Drawer functions.
sb3.storage.fcups.desc3: Note that if you are already familiar with &eStorage Drawers&r, you will find that the Storage Upgrades in &eFunctional Storage&r stack &6multiplicatively&r, meaning just two copper upgrades will increase your capacity to &664x&r the base amount!
sb3.storage.bhu.title: Black Hole Units
sb3.storage.bhu.subtitle: Make a Black Hole Unit
sb3.storage.bhu.desc1: &bBlack Hole Units&r store a massive amount of a single item.
sb3.storage.bhu.desc2: Each tier holds exponentially more than the last.
sb3.storage.bht.title: Black Hole Tanks
sb3.storage.bht.subtitle: Make a Black Hole Tank
sb3.storage.bht.desc1: &bBlack Hole Tanks&r store a large amount of a fluid.
sb3.storage.bht.desc2: Each tier holds exponentially more than the last.
sb3.storage.bhc.subtitle: Make a Black Hole Controller
sb3.storage.bhc.desc1: The &bBlack Hole Controller&r can store 16 Black Hole Units/Tanks, and will &6consolidate their inventories&r.
sb3.storage.bhc.desc2: That is, the Controller will pretend it's every Unit/Tank it holds combined into one inventory.
sb3.rs.c.subtitle: Make a Controller
sb3.rs.c.desc: The &bController&r is the heart of a &eRefined Storage&r network.
sb3.rs.dd.subtitle: Make a Disk Drive
sb3.rs.dd.desc: The &bDisk Drive&r holds Disks, which themselves hold items or fluids.
sb3.rs.id.title: Item Disks
sb3.rs.id.subtitle: Make an Item Disk
sb3.rs.id.desc: &bItem Disks&r store items. Contents accessed through Grids.
sb3.rs.fd.title: Fluid Disks
sb3.rs.fd.subtitle: Make a Fluid Disk
sb3.rs.fd.desc: &bFluid Disks&r store fluids. Contents accessed through Fluid Grids.
sb3.rs.g.subtitle: Make a Grid
sb3.rs.g.desc: The &bGrid&r allows you to access the contents of Disks in the network.
sb3.rs.cg.subtitle: Make a Crafting Grid
sb3.rs.cg.desc: The &bCrafting Grid&r has a 3x3 crafting gui.
sb3.rs.wg.subtitle: Make a Wireless Grid
sb3.rs.wg.desc: The &bWireless Grid&r can wirelessly access the network.
sb3.rs.wcg.subtitle: Make a Wireless Crafting Grid
sb3.rs.wcg.desc: The &bWireless Crafting Grid&r can wirelessly access the network.
sb3.rs.pg.subtitle: Make a Pattern Grid
sb3.rs.pg.desc: The &bPattern Grid&r can encode &6Patterns&r, which are required for autocrafting.
sb3.rs.cr.subtitle: Make a Crafter
sb3.rs.fg.subtitle: Make a Fluid Grid
sb3.rs.fg.desc: The &bFluid Grid&r provides access to the contents of Fluid Disks in the network.
sb3.rs.r.subtitle: Make a Requester
sb3.rs.r.desc: The &bRequester&r automatically makes autocraft requests when the network has less than a certain amount of a specified item.
sb3.ae2.p.title: Inscriber Presses
sb3.ae2.p.subtitle: Make an Inscriber Press
sb3.ae2.p.desc: &bInscriber Presses&r is used to make various &6Circuits&r.
sb3.ae2.c.subtitle: Make a Controller
sb3.ae2.c.desc: The &bController&r is the heart of an &eAE2&r network, providing channels for additional devices.
sb3.ae2.d.subtitle: Make an ME Drive
sb3.ae2.ic.title: Item Storage Cells
sb3.ae2.ic.subtitle: Make an Item Storage Cell
sb3.ae2.ic.desc1: &bItem Storage Cells&r store items. Higher tiers can hold more total items, but all tiers can only hold 63 unique items.
sb3.ae2.ic.desc2: &bME DISK Drives&r (short for &nD&reep &nI&rtem &nS&rtorage &nD&risk) from &eAE2 Things&r have no unique item limit.
sb3.ae2.fc.title: Fluid Storage Cells
sb3.ae2.fc.subtitle: Make a Fluid Storage Cell
sb3.ae2.t.subtitle: Make an ME Terminal
sb3.ae2.t.desc: The &bME Terminal&r allows access to the items and fluids in the network.
sb3.ae2.st.subtitle: Make an ME Security Terminal
sb3.ae2.st.desc1: The &bME Security Terminal&r allows you to choose how other players are allowed to interact with your ME system.
sb3.ae2.st.desc2: It is also where &6Wireless Terminals&r are bound to the network.
sb3.ae2.wt.subtitle: Make a Wireless Terminal
sb3.ae2.wt.desc: The &bWireless Terminal&r allows wireless access to the network.
sb3.ae2.ct.subtitle: Make an ME Crafting Terminal
sb3.ae2.ct.desc: The &bME Crafting Terminal&r has a 3x3 crafting gui.
sb3.ae2.wct.subtitle: Make a Wireless Crafting Terminal
sb3.ae2.wct.desc: The &bWireless Crafting Terminal&r has a 3x3 crafting gui.
sb3.ae2.pet.subtitle: Make an ME Pattern Encoding Terminal
sb3.ae2.pet.desc: The &bME Pattern Encoding Terminal&r can encode &6Patterns&r, which are required for autocrafting.
sb3.ae2.pat.subtitle: Make an ME Pattern Access Terminal
sb3.ae2.pat.desc: The &bME Pattern Access Terminal&r allows you to access all Pattern Providers on the network.
sb3.ae2.pp.subtitle: Make an ME Pattern Provider
sb3.ae2.pp.desc: The &bME Pattern Provider&r is where autocraft request ingredients are sent.
sb3.ae2.cs.title: Crafting CPU
sb3.ae2.cs.subtitle: Make a Crafting CPU
sb3.ae2.cs.desc: &bCrafting Storage&r and &bCrafting Co-Processors&r make a &bCrafting CPU&r when placed adjacent to each other, which are required for autocraft requests.
sb3.ae2.ma.subtitle: Make a Molecular Assembler
sb3.ae2.ma.desc: The &bMolecular Assembler&r will autocraft normal recipes when connected to an ME Pattern Provider.
sb3.storage.modular.subtitle: Make a Modular Storage
sb3.storage.modular.desc1: The &bModular Storage&r can store a single &bStorage Module&r inside.
sb3.storage.modular.desc2: Each higher tier of Module can store an additional 100 items.
sb3.storage.scanner.subtitle: Make a Storage Scanner
sb3.storage.scanner.desc: The &bStorage Scanner&r can access the contents of all inventories nearby.
sb3.storage.ps.title: Pocket Storage
sb3.storage.ps.subtitle: Make a Pocket Storage
sb3.storage.ps.desc1: &bPocket Storages&r can store only a small amount of unique items, but can store a massive amount of each.
sb3.storage.ps.desc2: Each tier holds more unique items, as well as more of each.
sb3.storage.sb.title: Simply Backpacks
sb3.storage.sb.subtitle: Make a Backpack
sb3.storage.sb.desc: &bBackpacks&r store items. Each tier holds more. Sneak right-click to edit its settings.
sb3.armour.title: The Ultimate Armor
sb3.create.title: Create
sb3.create.ww.subtitle: Make a Water Wheel
sb3.create.ww.desc: &bWater Wheels&r generate rotational energy when spun with a water current.
sb3.create.mp.subtitle: Make a Mechanical Press
sb3.create.mp.desc: The &bMechanical Press&r processes items underneath that are on Depots or Belts.
sb3.create.mix.subtitle: Make a Mixer
sb3.create.mix.desc: The &bMixer&r processes items that are in a Basin below.
sb3.create.wrench.subtitle: Make a Wrench
sb3.create.bb.subtitle: Make a Blaze Burner
sb3.create.bb.desc: The &bBlaze Burner&r is required for some &6Mixer&r recipes. While it can use any furnace fuel, &bBlaze Cake&r is the most powerful.
sb3.create.ma.subtitle: Make a Mechanical Arm
sb3.create.ma.desc: &bMechanical Arms&r can move items with much more precision than Mechanical Belts.
sb3.create.mc.subtitle: Make Mechanical Crafters
sb3.create.mc.desc: &bMechanical Crafters&r can autocraft recipes, including some that are larger than 3x3.
sb3.create.mb.subtitle: Make Mechanical Belts
sb3.create.mb.desc: &bMechanical Belts&r move items and entities along them.
sb3.create.rl.subtitle: Make Redstone Links
sb3.create.rl.desc: &bRedstone Links&r can wirelessly transmit redstone signals between each other.
sb3.create.se.subtitle: Make a Steam Engine
sb3.create.se.desc: The &bSteam Engine&r, when placed on a Tank full of water with heat below, generates rotational energy.
sb3.create.ts.subtitle: Make a Train Station
sb3.create.ts.desc2: Frankly, it's too complex to describe here. Use the mod's &6Ponder&r system instead.
sb3.create.em.subtitle: Make an Electric Motor
sb3.create.em.desc: The &bElectric Motor&r converts FE to rotational energy.
sb3.create.alt.subtitle: Make an Alternator
sb3.create.alt.desc: The &bAlternator&r converts rotational energy to FE.
sb3.create.eg.subtitle: Make some Engineer's Goggles
sb3.create.eg.desc: While worn, &bEngineer's Goggles&r will show you details about various machines.
sb3.create.mh.subtitle: Make a Mechanical Harvester
sb3.create.mh.desc: While part of a moving contraption, the &bMechanical Harvester&r will harvest and replant crops.
sb3.misc.title: Misc
sb3.misc.torch.subtitle: Make a Mega Torch
sb3.misc.torch.desc: The &bMega Torch&r blocks monster spawns in an area.
sb3.misc.dread.subtitle: Make a Dread Lamp
sb3.misc.dread.desc: The &bDread Lamp&r blocks passive spawns in an area.
sb3.misc.feral.subtitle: Make a Feral Flare Lantern
sb3.misc.feral.desc: The &bFeral Flare Lantern&r places invisible lights nearby&r.
sb3.misc.bg.title: Building Gadgets
sb3.misc.bg.subtitle: Make something from Building Gadgets
sb3.misc.bg.desc: &eBuilding Gadgets&r has several &bGadgets&r that make building a base much easier.
sb3.misc.cs.subtitle: Make a Charging Station
sb3.misc.cs.desc: You can charge items with FE in the &bCharging Station&r.
sb3.misc.mg.title: Mining Gadgets
sb3.misc.mg.subtitle: Make a Mining Gadget
sb3.misc.mg.desc1: &bMining Gadgets&r shoot lasers that mine blocks, with a cost of FE.
sb3.misc.mg.desc2: All three types function the same, the difference is only visual.
sb3.misc.mgu.title: Mining Gadget Upgrades
sb3.misc.mgu.subtitle: Make an Upgrade
sb3.misc.mgu.desc: &bUpgrades&r can be installed to your Mining Gadget in the &bModification Table&r.
sb3.misc.if.title: Iron Furnaces
sb3.misc.if.subtitle: Make an upgraded Furnace
sb3.misc.if.desc: The mod &eIron Furnaces&r adds several tiers of &bFurnace&r that smelt faster.
sb3.misc.temp.subtitle: Make a Tempad
sb3.misc.temp.desc1: &bTempads&r are used to &6teleport from one place to another&r.
sb3.misc.temp.desc2: Open the GUI and choose "RUN PROGRAM." Add a location, and you'll be able to teleport to it from anywhere.
sb3.misc.temp.desc3: Teleporting is free, but has a 3 minute cooldown.
sb3.misc.pouch.title: Time in a Pouch
sb3.misc.pouch.subtitle: Make a Temporal Pouch
sb3.misc.pouch.desc: The &bTemporal Pouch&r slowly collects time as it sits in your inventory. You can use it on machines to speed them up, using the stored time.
sb3.misc.hearthstone.title: /home but balanced™
sb3.misc.hearthstone.subtitle: Make a Hearthstone
sb3.misc.hearthstone.desc1: The &bHearthstone &rallows you to quickly teleport to your personal bed or respawn anchor (or the [0, 0] point of your dimension if you don't have either).
sb3.misc.hearthstone.desc2: ...sure, you &ocould&r just use &6/ftbstoneblock home&r to accomplish the same thing, but where's the fun in that?
sb3.misc.obelisk.title: EnderIO, anyone?
sb3.misc.obelisk.subtitle: Make an Experience Obelisk
sb3.misc.obelisk.desc1: The &bExperience Obelisk &ris an &aXP tank&r where you can quickly store or retrieve exactly the amount of XP levels you need at the moment.
sb3.misc.obelisk.desc2: It can also be set to automatically absorb nearby XP orbs, and can be set to only work with a redstone signal!
sb3.misc.trash.title: Trash Cans
sb3.misc.trash.subtitle: Make a Trash Can
sb3.misc.trash.desc: &bTrash Cans&r destroy what is inserted into them.
sb3.misc.cw.title: Construction Wands
sb3.misc.cw.subtitle: Make a Construction Wand
sb3.misc.cw.desc: &bConstruction Wands&r allow you to place a large number of blocks quickly.
sb3.misc.cw.toggle: Swap between Cores by left-clicking air while sneaking, and holding the Wand.
sb3.misc.ac.subtitle: Make an Angel Core
sb3.misc.ac.desc: The &bAngel Core&r can be installed on the Wand to allow you to place blocks on the side opposite from the one you click.
sb3.misc.dc.subtitle: Make a Destruction Core
sb3.misc.dc.desc: The &bDestruction Core&r can be installed on the Wand to allow you to &cpermanently destroy blocks in an area&r. They will not drop anything.
sb3.misc.ent.subtitle: Make an Entangled Block
sb3.misc.ent.desc1: When you link an &bEntangled Block&r to another block with the &bEntangled Binder&r, the Entangled Block pretends it's that block.
sb3.misc.ent.desc2: This means you can pipe things in and out of the EB, and it'll pipe in and out of the linked block instead, even at a distance.
sb3.misc.tess.subtitle: Make a Tesseract
sb3.misc.tess.desc: &bTesseracts&r allow you to teleport items, fluid, and energy.
sb3.misc.compact.subtitle: Make a Compact Machine
sb3.misc.compact.desc1: &bCompact Machines&r contain a small area inside, which you can access with a &bPersonal Shrinking Device&r.
sb3.misc.compact.desc2: Each tier has more space than the last. You can use &6Tunnels&r to bring items, fluids, and energy in and out.
sb3.misc.automation_station.title: Automation Station
sb3.misc.automation_station.subtitle: Make an Auto-Hammer and an Automatic Smithing Table
sb3.misc.automation_station.desc1: &bAuto-Hammers&r will &6freely and automatically Hammer&r items inserted into it.
sb3.misc.automation_station.desc2: Items must be inserted into the blue side, and the output is automatically output from the red side.
sb3.misc.automation_station.desc3: The &bSmithing Table (Auto)&r uses FE to automate Smithing Table crafts. Sneak right-click the block's sides to configure where the inputs and outputs are.
sb3.misc.pp.title: Pretty Pipes
sb3.misc.pp.subtitle: Make a Pipe
sb3.misc.pp.desc: &bPipes&r move items. They need &6Modules&r to actually work.
sb3.misc.ppm.title: Modules
sb3.misc.ppm.subtitle: Make a Pipe Module
sb3.misc.ppm.desc: &bModules&r can be applied to Pipes to dictate how they work.
sb3.misc.ppt.title: Terminals
sb3.misc.ppt.subtitle: Make a Terminal
sb3.misc.ppt.desc: The &bItem Terminal&r shows the contents of all Pipes, and allows you to request the items.
sb3.misc.fp.subtitle: Make a Fluid Pipe
sb3.misc.pz.title: Pipez
sb3.misc.pz.subtitle: Make a Pipe
sb3.misc.pz.desc: &bPipes&r move things, depending on the type of Pipe. You have to use a &bConfigurator&r on the Pipe connected to the source.
sb3.misc.pzu.title: Pipe Upgrades
sb3.misc.pzu.subtitle: Make a Pipe Upgrade
sb3.endgame.title: Endgame
sb3.pe.ec.subtitle: Make an Energy Condenser
sb3.pe.ec.desc1: The &bEnergy Condenser&r converts items into EMC, and then EMC into another item.
sb3.pe.ec.desc2: Place the item you want in the top left slot, and place the items to destroy in the inventory.
sb3.pe.ec2.subtitle: Make an Energy Condenser MK2
sb3.pe.ec2.desc: The &bEnergy Condenser MK2&r has separate inventories for input and output.
sb3.pe.tt.subtitle: Make a Transmutation Table
sb3.pe.tt.desc1: The &bTransmutation Table&r can deconstruct items, learning them and turning them into EMC (stored in the player).
sb3.pe.tt.desc2: Learned items can be created on the right, using up EMC.
sb3.pe.tt.desc3: EMC-using items can be charged in the slots on the left.
sb3.pe.tt2.subtitle: Make a Transmutation Tablet
sb3.pe.tt2.desc: The &bTransmutation Tablet&r is a portable Transmutation Table.
sb3.pe.att.subtitle: Make an Arcane Transmutation Tablet
sb3.pe.att.desc: The &bArcane Transmutation Tablet&r is an upgraded Transmutation Tablet, with a better GUI and some nicer features.
sb3.pe.at.subtitle: Make an Alchemy Table
sb3.pe.at.desc: The &bAlchemy Table&r can convert items to other items using EMC, provided by Energy Collectors.
sb3.pe.col.title: Energy Collectors
sb3.pe.col.subtitle: Make an Energy Collector
sb3.pe.col.desc: &bEnergy Collectors&r &6passively generate EMC&r, sending it out to adjacent blocks like the Energy Condenser.
sb3.pe.col2.title: Energy Collectors+
sb3.pe.col2.subtitle: Make a higher tier Energy Collectors
sb3.pe.col2.desc: &bEnergy Collectors&r from the addon &eExtendedeXchange&r reach much higher tiers, producing exponentially more EMC per second.
sb3.pe.amr.title: Anti-Matter Relays
sb3.pe.amr.subtitle: Make an Anti-Matter Relay
sb3.pe.amr.desc1: &bAnti-Matter Relays&r transfer EMC from adjacent Energy Collectors to adjacent Energy Condensers. This way, you can use 18 Collectors instead of 6.
sb3.pe.amr.desc2: You can also charge EMC-holding items here.
sb3.pe.amr2.title: Anti-Matter Relays+
sb3.pe.amr2.subtitle: Make a higher tier Anti-Matter Relay
sb3.pe.amr2.desc: &bAnti-Matter Relays&r from the addon &eExtendedeXchange&r reach much higher tiers, moving exponentially more EMC per second. They &ccannot charge items&r however.
sb3.pe.tok.subtitle: Make a Tome of Knowledge
sb3.pe.tok.desc: The &bTome of Knowledge&r will &6teach all items&r when put through the Transmutation Tablet.
sb3.pe.eml.subtitle: Make the Energy EMC Link
sb3.pe.eml.desc: The &bEnergy EMC Link&r will take EMC (from Collectors and Relays etc) and insert it into the owner's personal EMC.
sb3.pe.ps.subtitle: Make a Philosopher's Stone
sb3.pe.ps.desc: The &bPhilosopher's Stone&r allows you to convert through equivalent items and blocks, by crafting or by right-clicking.
sb3.pe.woft.subtitle: Make a Watch of Flowing Time
sb3.pe.woft.desc1: The &bWatch of Flowing Time&r will speed up machines nearby you, at the cost of EMC.
sb3.pe.woft.desc2: Enable with the "Change Mode" keybind, which is unbound by default.
sb3.pe.fuel.title: Morbius Fuel
sb3.pe.fuel.subtitle: Make an alchemical Fuel
sb3.pe.fuel.desc: &bAlchemical Fuels&r smelt more items than normal Coal, and are used in certain recipes.
sb3.pe.klein.title: Klein Stars
sb3.pe.klein.subtitle: Make a Klein Stars
sb3.pe.klein.desc: &bKlein Stars&r (as well as &bMagnum Stars&r) store EMC in your inventory.
sb3.pe.dm.subtitle: Make Dark Matter
sb3.pe.dm.desc: &bDark Matter&r is used in several crafting recipes.
sb3.pe.rm.subtitle: Make Red Matter
sb3.pe.rm.desc: &bRed Matter&r is used in several crafting recipes.
sb3.pe.dmt.title: Dark Matter Tools
sb3.pe.dmt.subtitle: Make a Dark Matter tool
sb3.pe.dmt.desc1: &bDark Matter tools&r are unbreakable, and have special abilities.
sb3.pe.dmt.desc2: Their power can be increased using the &6"Charge"&r key, and the modes can be changed with the &6"Change Mode"&r key.
sb3.pe.rings.title: Rings of Power
sb3.pe.rings.subtitle: Make an alchemical ring
sb3.pe.rings.desc: These &balchemical rings&r perform a variety of functions when worn or right-clicked.
sb3.pe.dma.title: Dark Matter Armor
sb3.pe.dma.subtitle: Make Dark Matter armor
sb3.pe.dma.desc: &bDark Matter armor&r is unbreakable and VERY resistant to damage.
sb3.pe.rma.title: Red Matter Armor
sb3.pe.rma.subtitle: Make Red Matter armor
sb3.pe.rma.desc: &bRed Matter armor&r is unbreakable and EVEN MORE resistant to damage.
sb3.pe.gma.title: Gem Armor
sb3.pe.gma.subtitle: Make Gem armor
sb3.pe.gma.desc: &bGem armor&r is unbreakable, grants you the ability to fly, and VERY VERY resistant to damage.
sb3.pe.rmt.title: Red Matter Tools
sb3.pe.rmt.subtitle: Make a Red Matter tool
sb3.pe.rmt.desc: &bRed Matter tools&r are direct upgrades to their Dark Matter versions.
sb3.pe.rmt2.title: Upgraded Red Matter Tools
sb3.pe.rmt2.subtitle: Make a upgraded Red Matter tool
sb3.pe.rmt2.desc: The &bRed Morning Star&r is a combination of the Red Matter tools, and the &bRed Katar&r is a combination of the weapons.
sb3.pe.flower.title: Flower Power
sb3.pe.flower.subtitle: Make any tier power flower
sb3.pe.flower.desc: The power flower can generate EMC automatically without any input requirement. With 16 tiers available your EMC needs should easily be satisfied
sb3.pe.flower.desc2: Try saying power flower, flower power 10 times fast!
sb3.pe.elink.subtitle: Make a Personal EMC Link
sb3.pe.elink.desc1: The &bPersonal EMC Link&r works like an Energy Condenser, but uses your personal EMC.
sb3.pe.elink.desc2: Items can be piped in and out.
sb3.pe.elink2.subtitle: Make a Refined EMC Link
sb3.pe.elink2.desc1: The &bRefined EMC Link&r constantly keeps 9 items stocked, using your personal EMC.
sb3.pe.elink2.desc2: Teach it an item by inserting it, and it will keep the item stocked.
sb3.pe.elink3.subtitle: Make a Compressed Refined EMC Link
sb3.pe.elink3.desc: Just like the Refined EMC Link, however with &6546r Output slots.
sb3.endgame.avaritia_armor.title: The Ultimate Armor
sb3.endgame.avaritia_armor.boots.title: Always in fashion
sb3.endgame.avaritia_armor.leggings.titl: Does my butt look big in these?
sb3.endgame.avaritia_armor.helm.title: I see beyond this reality now
sb3.endgame.avaritia_armor.helm.subtitle: Make an Infinity Helmet
sb3.endgame.avaritia_armor.sword.title: The Ultimate Armor's Sword
sb3.endgame.avaritia_armor.sword.subtitl: Hurts more than a stubbed toe
sb3.endgame.avaritia_armor.pickaxe.title: The Ultimate Armor's Pickaxe
sb3.endgame.avaritia_armor.axe.title: The Ultimate Armor's Axe
sb3.endgame.avaritia_armor.axe.subtitle: Deforester of nations
sb3.endgame.avaritia_armor.shovel.title: The Ultimate Armor's Shovel
sb3.endgame.avaritia_armor.bow.title: The Ultimate Armor's Bow
sb3.endgame.avaritia_armor.bow.subtitle: Unwavering aim
sb3.endgame.singularities.title: Densitas Infinita
sb3.endgame.singularities.stew.title: Ultimate Stew
sb3.endgame.singularities.stew.subtitle: Make Ultimate Stew
sb3.endgame.singularities.stew.descripti: Only a god could eat this much
sb3.endgame.singularities.infinity.title: Infinity Catalyst
sb3.endgame.singularities.record_fragmen: Obtain a few record fragments, they're used to craft the infinity catalyst.
sb3.endgame.singularities.crystal_matrix: Spend all your diamonds on crafting these
sb3.endgame.singularities.infinity_ingot: How has this not broken reality?!
sb3.endgame.singularities.crafting.title: The Ultimate Crafting Table
sb3.endgame.singularities.crafting.descr: If you're about to make this, you better be prepared for what's to come...
sb3.endgame.singularities.collect.desc: Generates a single Tiny Pile of Neutrons every 6 or so minutes.
sb3.endgame.singularities.nug.subtitle: Make a Neutronium Nugget
sb3.endgame.singularities.ball.subtitle: Make Cosmic Meatballs
